sense.name: Utter profanities (at).
sense.commentary: Note: This sense MUST INCLUDE linguistic content. If there is nothing 'said,' use Sense 2. Includes: CURSE OUT
sense.examples: The drunken men were cursing loudly in the street. Mary cursed out her husband. The taxi driver cursed at the passenger when he didn't pay.

sense.name: Wish harm upon; invoke evil upon, possibly by excluding from a religious community.
sense.examples: The bad witch cursed the child. The church cursed the teens and sent them away. Curse you! Mary cursed her husband, wishing him to die.
